description: Smaller member of friendly pairs ordered by smallest maximal element.
comments: Conjecture: If a(n) is in A005153, then A050973(n) is in A005153. It is natural to ask if there exists a generalization of the indicator function for A005153, call it m(n), such that m(n) = 1 for n in A005153, 0 < m(n) < 1 otherwise, and m(a(n)) <= m(A050973(n)) for all n. See also A017666. - _Jaycob Coleman_, Sep 27 2014
links: Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Friendly Pair.
crossrefs: Cf. A050973 (larger member of pair), A074902 (friendly numbers).
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
